Sentencas: Nanocrystalline fluorite type samarium doped ceria (SDC) electrolyte thin film for intermediate temperature-solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs) application were prepared on the dense and porous substrates at low temperatures of 573-1373 K using a novel citrate sol-gel route combined with a sol suspension spray coating technique.
Titulo: Preparation of SDC electrolyte thin films on dense and porous substrates by modified sol-grel route

Sentencas: Thermogravimetric analysis showed that the decomposition of the citrate gel film and the initial crystallization of the SDC occurred at a low temperature of about 590 K. XRD examination revealed that the annealing of the green film at temperatures of 573-1373 K provided cubic nanocrystalline SDC phase.
Titulo: Preparation of SDC electrolyte thin films on dense and porous substrates by modified sol-grel route

Sentencas: The crystallite sizes were in the range of 9-19 nm.
Titulo: Preparation of SDC electrolyte thin films on dense and porous substrates by modified sol-grel route

Sentencas: Microscopic observations indicated that the derived film was homogeneous, dense and crack-free.
Titulo: Preparation of SDC electrolyte thin films on dense and porous substrates by modified sol-grel route
Preparation of SDC electrolyte thin films on dense and porous substrates by modified sol-grel route

Sentencas: The desired thickness for preparation of thin electrolyte films from hundreds of nm to several mu m should be controllable and feasible by repeating the simple and inexpensive citrate sol-gel spray coating process.
Titulo: Preparation of SDC electrolyte thin films on dense and porous substrates by modified sol-grel route
Preparation of SDC electrolyte thin films on dense and porous substrates by modified sol-grel route
